Package jbt.execution.context

Class Summary
BasicContext Basic implementation of the IContext interface.
GenericBTLibrary Simple implementation of the IBTLibrary interface, which internally uses a Hashtable to map tree names to actual trees.
HierarchicalContext A HierarchicalContext is a context that stores a parent IContext to fall back to when it cannot find a particular variable in its own set of variables.
SafeContext The SafeContext represents a context that can be used to safely controls modifications in another context (the input context).
SafeOutputContext The SafeOutputContext represents a context that can be used to safely controls modifications in another context (the input context).
